solution_line_template: These contain {total_chocolate_chips} chocolate chips because {total_cookies} x {chocolate_chips_per_cookie} = <<{total_cookies}*{chocolate_chips_per_cookie}={total_chocolate_chips}>>{total_chocolate_chips}

They each get to eat {chips_per_family_member} chocolate chips because {total_chocolate_chips} / {num_family_members} = <<{total_chocolate_chips}/{num_family_members}={chips_per_family_member}>>{chips_per_family_member}
